DescribeRiskAssessment.document: This API is used to query risk assessment results.
DescribeRiskAssessment.name: Queries risk assessment results

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

InputBizCryptoData.document: Query input parameters of risk assessment results

OutputRiskAssessment.document: Query output parameters of risk assessment results.

members.document:

Note: This field may return null, indicating that no valid value is found.
